synopsis.text: Eldest son Arata Shiunji has always been the center of attention in his wealthy family, surrounded by his five beautiful and intelligent sisters and one brother. Despite their constant teasing, Arata values his family above all else. However, his world is turned upside down when his father reveals a shocking secret on his youngest sister's fifteenth birthday - the Shiunji siblings are not related by blood. With this newfound knowledge, Arata's once predictable life takes a dramatic turn, and he must navigate the complexities of love and relationships with his siblings. As he embarks on this nerve-wracking journey, Arata discovers that the most forbidden love can also be the most unyielding.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
